mapper.insert: INSERT INTO laboratory (name, buildingNo, createTime, isAppointment, updateTime) VALUES (#{name}, #{buildingNo}, #{createTime}, #{isAppointment}, #{updateTime})

INSERT INTO user_laboratory (code, userId, laboratoryId, appointTime, returnTime, overdueTime, auditId, state, createTime) VALUES (#{code}, #{userId}, #{laboratoryId}, #{appointTime}, #{returnTime}, #{overdueTime}, #{auditId}, #{state}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select ul.appointTime,ul.returnTime,ul.code,la.name,la.buildingNo,us.name as userName,us.number,ul.state,ul.id from user_laboratory ul LEFT JOIN laboratory la on la.id = ul.laboratoryId Left JOIN user us on ul.userId = us.id WHERE ul.state = #{state}

select ul.appointTime,ul.returnTime,ul.code,la.name,la.buildingNo,us.name as userName,us.number,ul.state,ul.id from user_laboratory ul LEFT JOIN laboratory la on la.id = ul.laboratoryId Left JOIN user us on ul.userId = us.id WHERE ul.state != 0
